hero.title: IA min bɛ Bamanankan kuma
hero.subtitle: Ekodi ye porozɛ niimanw ye. Modɛli bɛ kalanni na, bɛ bonya, bɛ ɲɛnabɔ don o don — i bɛ se ka kɛ o sira kan.
hero.leitmotiv: Ekodi bɛ yan. A bɛ i ka kan kuma.

features.title: Ekodi bɛ se ka mun kɛ
features.voice_desc: Kuma bamanankan walima tubabukan na. Ekodi bɛ lamɛn, bɛ faamu, ka jaabi Bamanankan na — i ko kumaɲɔgɔnya.
features.translate_desc: Tubabukan ni bamanankan cɛ tɛmɛni ka nɔgɔn. Sɛbɛnni don, sɛbɛnni bɔ — tiɲɛ ni teliya.
features.tts_desc: Ekodi tɛ sɛbɛnni dɔrɔn kɛ. A bɛ kuma. Bamanankan kuma jɛlen, ɲuman.
features.api_desc: Bamanankan kuma ni bayɛlɛmani fara i ka porogaramuw kan ni API nɔgɔman ye.

how.title: A man gɛlɛn i ko kumaɲɔgɔnya
how.step2_desc: I ka ciden bɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛ joona

demo.title: A filɛ a baara la
demo.user_msg: I ni ce, Ekodi! Bamako sigida jumɛn ka bon?
demo.ai_msg: I ni ce! Bamako sigida camanw ka ɲi kosɛbɛ. Hamdallaye, ACI 2000, ani Badalabougou ye sigida ɲumanw ye...

api_showcase.title: Bamanankan IA don i ka porogaramu la
api_showcase.subtitle: API REST nɔgɔman min bɛ Bamanankan kuma, bayɛlɛmani, ani hakilitigiya fara porogaramu bɛɛ kan.

story.proverb: A bɛ sɛnɛ ɲiɔ tɔw ɲɛ, a bɛ bonya ka tɛmɛ u bɛɛ kan.
story.desc: Bamanankan na, Sambala ɲiɔ ye ɲiɔ ye min bɛ sɛnɛ fɔlɔ — a bɛ bonya joona ka tɛmɛ tɔw kan. Ekodi bɛ o niyɔrɔ ta: IA fɔlɔ min bɛ Bamanankan kuma tiɲɛ tiɲɛ. I ko sambala, a bɛ bonya tuma bɛɛ — i ka muɲuli ni i ka kɔfɔli ye sanji ye min bɛ a dɛmɛ ka wili.

project.label: Baara bɛ kɛ a kan
project.title: Ekodi ye porozɛ ye, a ma ban fɔlɔ
project.desc: Modɛli bɛ kalanni na tuma bɛɛ, bɛ ɲɛnabɔ. Jaabi bɛɛ tɛna dafa — o de ye i ka baara ye. Ni i ye Ekodi baara ka kɔfɔli di, i bɛ IA dɛmɛ ka Bamanankan kalan ka fisa. Muɲu, tiɲɛ fɔ, an ka fɛn ɲuman jɔ ɲɔgɔn fɛ.

pricing.title: Gansan ka an jɔ ɲɔgɔn fɛ
pricing.subtitle: Prompt 10 gansan sɔrɔ ka Ekodi dɛmɛ. I ka kɔfɔli bɛ an dɛmɛ ka modɛli kalanni ka ɲɛnabɔ.

feedback_cta.title: I bɛ Ekodi kalanni na
feedback_cta.subtitle: Nin tɛ robot dɔrɔn ye — a ye modɛli ye min bɛ kalan. Ni i ye jaabi ɲuman walima jugu jira, walima bayɛlɛmani ladilan, i bɛ IA kalanni na yɛrɛ yɛrɛ. Ekodi bɛ ɲɛnabɔ i ɲɔgɔnw barakɛ de kosɔn.
feedback_cta.badge: I ka kɔfɔli bɛ modɛli kalanni na
feedback_cta.note: An b'a dɔn Ekodi ma dafa fɔlɔ. O de ye kɔrɔ. An dɛmɛ k'a kɛ Bamanankan IA ɲumanba ye diɲɛ kɔnɔ.

ynnov.title: Ynnov ye a jɔ
ynnov.desc: Ynnov bɛ miriya ni laɲini yɛlɛma tiɲɛ ye ni IA fɛɛrɛw ye minw dabɔra Afiriki ni jamana wɛrɛw ye. Sɛgɛsɛgɛli ka taa kunnafoni hakilitigiya ma, Ynnov bɛ jɛkuluw dɛmɛ ka se bonya laban ma.
ynnov.mission: Miriya ka kɛ tiɲɛ ye — IA fɛɛrɛw diɲɛ kɔnɔ nafaw ye.

auth.register_subtitle: Don Ekodi la — Bamanankan IA dɛmɛbaga
auth.name: Tɔgɔ

chat.welcome: I ni ce! Bisimila Ekodi la
chat.welcome_hint: Ɲininkali kɛ — ne bɛ bamanankan ni tubabukan kuma!
